page.title: 19MY SUMMER
page.content: {MYLES GASKELL 1BE In the Summer I will go swimming in the sea, it is as warm sometimes as in the swimming pool. I go fishing in the harbour for bass and pol1ock and I'll fish the River Aeron for salmon and sewen. I might get a summer job for a week or two then I will spend all the money in the shops. I will have to do some gardening as well, and get firewood. {SCOTT CRUICKSHANK 1BE The only activity I will be doing in the Summer is swimming and playing tennis.I might go down to see one of my friends who lives by the River Aeron. I will go down to see the tug of war across the Harbour. One of my cousins was in it one year but he did not fall in (worse luck!). In the summer there will be no room to park the car for miles and it will be noisy
